title: The Next Great Wonders
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Next Great Wonders.

hook.text: Every era builds its wonders. What will future civilizations think of ours?

buildup.text: The Burj Khalifa stands 2,717 feet tall. The International Space Station orbits Earth.

discovery.text: The Channel Tunnel links England and France under the sea. It took 13,000 workers six years.

twist.text: Some argue the internet itself is our greatest wonder â€” invisible but connecting 5 billion people.

climax.text: Future archaeologists may find our data centers more impressive than any stone monument.

punchline.text: Every generation builds what the next one marvels at.
